definition: erhua variant of 年頭|年头[nian2 tou2]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: 's years since we've seen each other.
sentences.chinese: 我們有年頭兒沒見面了。

sentences.english: Wow, this stone tablet is quite old.
sentences.chinese: 哇，這塊兒石碑可是有些年頭兒。

sentences.english: The houses here look like they have been around for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 這兒的房子看起來有些年頭兒了。

sentences.english: The hot spring here is very old.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的溫泉可是很有年頭兒了。

sentences.english: Well, I've been in China also fora long time.
sentences.chinese: 那我來中國的年頭兒也不短了。
